meanings.definition: To treat or combine with vanadium.
meanings.sent1: I will vanadiate the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often vanadiate materials to enhance their properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to vanadiate the recipe by adding a touch of vanadium for a unique flavor twist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed seemed to vanadiate through every aspect of her life.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays seemed to vanadiate warmth and light throughout the room.

meanings.definition: A compound containing vanadium in a high oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory received a new shipment of vanadiates for research purposes.
meanings.sent2: Vanadiates are commonly used in industrial processes due to their unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The collection of colorful vanadiates on display caught the attention of many visitors.
meanings.sent4: The artist's palette included various shades of vanadiates to create a striking painting.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry store showcased a stunning necklace made of precious vanadiates.
